PROJECT(blake2b)
CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 3.2)

SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -Wall -Wextra -std=c89 -pedantic -Wno-long-long -O2")
SET(CMAKE_DEBUG_POSTFIX _debug)

# libblake2b

SET(BLK2B_SRCS
  src/blake2b.c
  )
ADD_LIBRARY(blake2b-static STATIC ${BLK2B_SRCS})
ADD_LIBRARY(blake2b-shared SHARED ${BLK2B_SRCS})

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(blake2b-static PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "blake2b")
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(blake2b-shared PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "blake2b")
